Name: BoxLoop 2
About the game: The Evil Boxes Are Back!! `````````````````````````````` ``````````````````````````` Decipher The Riddles Given To You By Dad and Stomp The Right box Color; To Advance Through The Game. Every Level Has a Unique Design That Corresponds With The Riddle You Are Given. The Riddles Have To Be Solved Relatively Fast or The Evil Box Will Cause The Time To Loop Again. Solve The Mystery of The Time Looping Evil Boxes and Save Our Hero Aous In His Puzzling Adventure.
